acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was purchased from Robert K. Black Rare Books and Autographs on October 13, 1969, and accessioned on March 12, 1970.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Thanks Abbey for his "kind note" in which Abbey indicated that he likes Janvier's Aztec.
